clinical_study.brief_title: A Clinical Study of Trazodone Hydrochloride Prolonged-Release Tablets for Treatment of Depression
clinical_study.official_title: A Clinical Study on Efficacy And Safety of Trazodone Hydrochloride Prolonged-Release Tablets for Treatment of Depression A Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Parallel Controlled Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a multicenter, randomized, double-blind, parallel-group, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of trazodone hydrochloride prolonged-release tablets for treatment of depression in Chinese population.

primary_outcome.measure: Change in Hamilton Depression Rating Scale-17 score
primary_outcome.description: 17-item Hamilton Depression Rating scale were evaluated at the basemline and six weeks after treatment, the changes were recorded and used as primary outcome measurement.

secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in HAMA-14 score at Visit 6/final visit

secondary_outcome.measure: CGI-Severity of illness and CGI-Global improvement
secondary_outcome.description: CGI-Severity of illness and CGI-Global improvement at Visit 6/final visit

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in evaluation of sleep quality and sexual dysfunction
secondary_outcome.description: change from baseline in evaluation of sleep quality and sexual dysfunction at Visit 6/final visit

rate of responders, defined as patients with a 50% improvement from baseline in the HAMD score at Visit6/final visit;or rate of patients with remission, defined as patients with HAMD score ≤7 at Visit 6/final visit.

intervention.description: Reference drug: trazodone hydrochloride prolonged-release tablet placebo (corresponding dummy drug of 75mg, 150mg active drug)

facility.name: The Second Xiangya Hospital of Central South University
